Before she died, family was with us to be by her side. She looked at everyone and said: "When someone you love has died and you think they have been taken from you, they are still with you. In your heart, your body, and your soul. They want you to be happy and carry on. I will always be here for you and show a sign every now and then when I do. I will make sure you can see me. I love you all." She then looked at me and said: "Oh my special boy... You will always be my number 1. Take care of your mother and your family for me. I will always be with you darling" She had passed away with a smile on her face and hold my face still. I cried so hard I dropped to the floor and it hurt so much. I promised her I would take care of everything she did. She gave me everything she had. I moved into her house and do everything we did together. My kids and wife know I suffer still and they do exactly what my grandma did. I miss her so much...
